name: Set of Sterling Silver stacking rings with faceted Garnets and a Rainbow Moonstone
description: These handmade Sterling Silver stacking rings consist of five 2.2mm bands that have been lightly hammered to provide texture and create a play of light over the Silver.The one band has been set with a 5mm round faceted Garnet, the other with a 7x5mm faceted Garnet and the centre band has been set with a beautiful Rainbow Monstone that has a wonderful, brilliant blue flash in it. The Garnets and Rainbow Moonstone compliment and contrast with each other and the combination of the two make for an interesting ring.

options.name: This ring can be made in any size and different stones can be used - contact me to discuss the options

name: Pair of Sterling Silver and 18ct Gold Flower Earrings
description: Pair of sterling Silver handmade earrings with 18ct Gold detail. These earrings have been handsawn by me and they are 6cm in length. The Sterling Silver has been given a brushed satin finish which softens the look and contrasts beautifully with the golden detail of the 18ct Gold.

name: Pair of Sterling Silver Lovebird Earrings
description:
Handmade Sterling Silver lovebird bird earrings with red enamelled heart wings. These earrings measure 5cm in length.

They are funky, fun and go with anything for any occasion.

options.name: The hearts can be enamelled in any colour - contact me to discuss the options

name: Sterling Silver Wire Wrapped Ring
description: This handmade Sterling Silver wire wrapped ring is 12 mm wide and can be worn by either men or women. It is elegant and stylish, contemporary and timeless.

options.name: This ring is available in different sizes, contact me to discuss the options

name: Pair of Sterling Silver Earrings with faceted Garnets
description:
Sterling Silver earrings with round faceted Garnets inspired by the jewellery of the Taureg tribe.
These earrings measure 30mm in length and 20mm in diameter. The individual components were all handsawn and hand engraved by me. I have oxidized the Sterling Silver to accentuate the layers and detail adding depth and definition to the design. The 6mm round faceted Garnets add drama to the earrings and contrast beautifully with the oxidizing and the Sterling Silver.
